Title: Desert Flower
Writer: Smita Bhide (script revisions), Waris Dirie (novel), Sherry Hormann, Cathleen Miller (novel), Wüstenblume (dubbing dialogue)
Actors: Soraya Omar-Scego, Idriss Abdillahi Houfaneh, Awa Saïd Darar, Roun Daher Aïnan
Plot: Waris Dirie, born 1965 in Somalia, flees at 13 when sold as 4th wife. She's maid at the Somalian embassy in London, then McDonald's, where she's discovered and becomes int'l top model. 1997, she speaks up against female genital mutilation.
